text: Mister Novelist () is a book by Russian writer Andrei Gusev, published in 1994. ==Plot summary== The book includes two stories and eleven short stories. All stories have unique plots. The reader's attention will be attracted by dramatic stories, lyrical scenes and BDSM fantasy. НА ПОРОГЕ ХХI ВЕКА, Всероссийский ежегодник: А.Е.Гусев – биография, М., «Московский Парнас», 2002 (с.92) ISBN 5-7330-052-20 Всероссийский ежегодник НА ПОРОГЕ ХХI ВЕКА: А.Е.Гусев – биография, М., «Московский Парнас», 2006 (с.85) ISBN 5-7330-05-40-2 The story “Mister Novelist” dedicates to the life of a young writer. The main place is occupied by the theme of love in his life. For a serious understanding of the problems of existence, a person needs not heaven or hell, but real life. This idea is heard in the story “Topography of Hell”, and the story itself is built on a love plot. The book is named after one of the included stories — "Mister Novelist".«Господин сочинитель» (отрывок) — a story by Andrei Gusev (on Proza.ru) == Literary features == In the relationships within love couples in the stories of this book, there is something from the famous film director Claude Lelouch. He always and everywhere glorified the Man and Woman created for each other.Послесловие Р.
